title: "Illegal instruction: 4" using pip version for OS X
body_html:
Can not import torch using Python 3.6.0 and OS X 10.12.5:

Collecting torch==0.2.0.post3 from http://download.pytorch.org/whl/torch-0.2.0.post3-cp36-cp36m-macosx_10_7_x86_64.whl
  Downloading http://download.pytorch.org/whl/torch-0.2.0.post3-cp36-cp36m-macosx_10_7_x86_64.whl (5.7MB)
    100% |████████████████████████████████| 5.7MB 13.5MB/s
Requirement already satisfied: pyyaml in ./.pyenv/versions/3.6.0/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from torch==0.2.0.post3)
Requirement already satisfied: numpy in ./.pyenv/versions/3.6.0/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from torch==0.2.0.post3)
Installing collected packages: torch
Successfully installed torch-0.2.0.post3
MacBook-Pro:~ Arseny$ pip install torchvision
Collecting torchvision
  Using cached torchvision-0.1.9-py2.py3-none-any.whl
Requirement already satisfied: six in ./.pyenv/versions/3.6.0/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from torchvision)
Requirement already satisfied: torch in ./.pyenv/versions/3.6.0/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from torchvision)
Requirement already satisfied: numpy in ./.pyenv/versions/3.6.0/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from torchvision)
Requirement already satisfied: pillow in ./.pyenv/versions/3.6.0/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from torchvision)
Requirement already satisfied: pyyaml in ./.pyenv/versions/3.6.0/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from torch->torchvision)
Requirement already satisfied: olefile in ./.pyenv/versions/3.6.0/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from pillow->torchvision)
Installing collected packages: torchvision
Successfully installed torchvision-0.1.9
MacBook-Pro:~ Arseny$ ipython
Python 3.6.0 (default, Mar  6 2017, 15:38:19)
Type "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.

IPython 5.3.0 -- An enhanced Interactive Python.
?         -> Introduction and overview of IPython's features.
%quickref -> Quick reference.
help      -> Python's own help system.
object?   -> Details about 'object', use 'object??' for extra details.

In [1]: import torch
Illegal instruction: 4
MacBook-Pro:~ Arseny$```

body:
Can not import `torch` using Python 3.6.0 and OS X 10.12.5:
```MacBook-Pro:~ Arseny$ pip install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/torch-0.2.0.post3-cp36-cp36m-macosx_10_7_x86_64.whl
Collecting torch==0.2.0.post3 from http://download.pytorch.org/whl/torch-0.2.0.post3-cp36-cp36m-macosx_10_7_x86_64.whl

    100% |████████████████████████████████| 5.7MB 13.5MB/s
Requirement already satisfied: pyyaml in ./.pyenv/versions/3.6.0/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from torch==0.2.0.post3)
Requirement already satisfied: numpy in ./.pyenv/versions/3.6.0/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from torch==0.2.0.post3)
Installing collected packages: torch
Successfully installed torch-0.2.0.post3
MacBook-Pro:~ Arseny$ pip install torchvision
Collecting torchvision
  Using cached torchvision-0.1.9-py2.py3-none-any.whl
Requirement already satisfied: six in ./.pyenv/versions/3.6.0/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from torchvision)
Requirement already satisfied: torch in ./.pyenv/versions/3.6.0/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from torchvision)
Requirement already satisfied: numpy in ./.pyenv/versions/3.6.0/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from torchvision)
Requirement already satisfied: pillow in ./.pyenv/versions/3.6.0/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from torchvision)
Requirement already satisfied: pyyaml in ./.pyenv/versions/3.6.0/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from torch->torchvision)
Requirement already satisfied: olefile in ./.pyenv/versions/3.6.0/lib/python3.6/site-packages (from pillow->torchvision)
Installing collected packages: torchvision
Successfully installed torchvision-0.1.9
MacBook-Pro:~ Arseny$ ipython
Python 3.6.0 (default, Mar  6 2017, 15:38:19)
Type "copyright", "credits" or "license" for more information.
